abstract: Accused of putting its own interests ahead of clients, the investment bank plans to detail new rules on disclosure and financial reporting. But the changes are mainly modifications of its operations rather than a complete overhaul.
snippet: Accused of putting its own interests ahead of clients, the investment bank plans to detail new rules on disclosure and financial reporting. But the changes are mainly modifications of its operations rather than a complete overhaul.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs to Fine-Tune Its Practices
